1.0.name: wordpress/timelines
1.0.description:
A simple interface allows to create, publish and manage interactive timelines based in arbitrary contents, not in the publications of your blog. The most part of available commands in Simile Timeline Widget can be defined via wp-admin > Posts > Timelines, no code needed.

Trough the administrative interface, you can:

  • Create unlimited timelines
  • Add how many tracks you want
  • Edit existent tracks
  • Add hot zones to the tracks, individually
  • Edit existent hot zones
  • Add decorators to (all) tracks
  • Edit existent decorators
  • Add events
  • Edit existent events
  • Publish timeline via shortcode
